description:
At the end of my course, students will be able to:

  1. Have a complete author web site with all the main pieces in place.
  2. Build a fully customized author web site using (free) WordPress platform
  3. Build header images and navigation bars
  4. Showcase your list of books
  5. Sell your books and eBooks right from your web site
  6. Monetize your web site (create buy now buttons)
  7. Build a shopping cart and checkout process
  8. Setup and configure PayPal (Payment Gateway)
  9. Set up a Newsletter and build a list of subscribers
  10. Drive traffic using SEO on-page techniques
  11. Secure your web site
  12. Backup your web site.

Who should take this course?

For any author or writer (or really anyone else) who wants complete control of building and customizing their web site. Any authors who want to make money from selling their books right from their site.

Who should not take this course?

This course is not for authors and writers who just want a pre built WordPress web site.

What will students need to know or do before starting the course?

No prior knowledge or technical skills is required.
title: How to Craft your Author Web Site With No Technical Skills
